messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How do you keep your records?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/2/2007 4:43:57 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, jesarojones@yahoo.com writes: Lastly, what do I do on Jan 31? Do I email my progress reports
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/2/2007 4:43:57 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
jesarojones@... writes:

Lastly, what do I do on Jan 31? Do I email my "progress reports" to
the accountability association? We belong to School's Out Support. How
does the portfolio work - is that something I need to have at all
times or twice yearly or just when asked? I really appreciate your
responses because I don't know what I'm doing!

Thanks,
Jessica
South Carolina



*****

Hi Jess. I'll write more off-list, but you do not need to send anything in
to School's Out Support. She will contact you at the end of the school year
for your signature that you DID keep files. She will not want to see them.

Leslie in SC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: How do you keep your records?
messages.msgSnippet: I am getting ready to start keeping a record of some sort...we are new to this and just withdrew the girls from school right before xmas break, so I m
messages.messageBody:
I am getting ready to start keeping a record of some sort...we are new
to this and just withdrew the girls from school right before xmas
break, so I'm wondering what you all find to be the best way. Do you
have a blog, or use a handwritten journal, or both? How often to you
make entries? I have looked at a few blogs from one of my yahoo groups
(was it here?) so I have a pretty good idea of what to do, but thought
you may have other suggestions.

Lastly, what do I do on Jan 31? Do I email my "progress reports" to
the accountability association? We belong to School's Out Support. How
does the portfolio work - is that something I need to have at all
times or twice yearly or just when asked? I really appreciate your
responses because I don't know what I'm doing!

Thanks,
Jessica
South Carolina
